full_instructions: On the next screen, you will be presented with instructions for the [b]Grid Memory[/b] activity.
During this activity, you will see 3 red dots appear briefly on a grid.
You will be asked to try to remember their locations!
Next, you will see a screen full of Es and Fs, like the example below.
You will be asked to tap all the Fs as quickly as you can!
When the empty grid appears, you will be asked to place dots where you remember seeing them by tapping on the grid.
[b]Hint:[/b] You can tap and untap to move the dots.
quick_instructions: For this activity, try to remember the location of 3 dots.
Before placing the 3 dots in their location, you will also have to tap some Fs on the screen as quickly as you can.
full_instructions_EASonly: You will see 3 red dots appear briefly on a grid.
Next, you will see a screen full of Es and Fs, like the example below.
Touch all the Fs as quickly as you can!
When the empty grid appears, please place dots where you remember seeing them!
[b]Hint:[/b] You can tap and untap to move the dots.
